alert.note: Alert for Eastern Currituck (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued June 03 at 4:44AM EDT until June 04 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Around one foot of inundation above ground level, with locally one to two feet possible, in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Eastern Currituck County. In Virginia, Virginia Beach. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 1 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding is expected in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline resulting in a low threat of property damage. Expect up to one foot of water, with locally higher amounts, above ground level in low lying, vulnerable areas. Some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks and lawns near the waterfront will experience flooding. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. SEWELLS POINT VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 2.7 FT, MAJOR 3.7 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 03/09 AM 3.1 0.3 0.8 1 NONE 03/10 PM 5.1 2.3 2.0 3-4 MINOR 04/09 AM 4.7 1.9 2.5 3 MINOR 04/10 PM 4.9 2.1 1.8 2 MINOR 05/11 AM 3.8 1.0 1.4 1 NONE 05/11 PM 4.4 1.6 1.3 1-2 NONE CHESAPEAKE BAY BRIDGE TUNNEL VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 5.0 FT, MODERATE 5.5 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.1 FT, MODERATE 2.6 FT, MAJOR 3.1 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 03/08 AM 3.2 0.3 0.8 1-2 NONE 03/09 PM 5.0 2.1 1.7 3-5 MINOR 04/09 AM 4.6 1.7 2.1 4-5 NONE 04/09 PM 5.0 2.1 1.6 3 MINOR 05/10 AM 3.7 0.8 1.2 1 NONE 05/10 PM 4.3 1.4 1.0 2 NONE LYNNHAVEN INLET VA MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.5 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 5.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 03/09 AM 3.2 0.5 1.1 1 NONE 03/09 PM 5.0 2.3 2.1 1 MODERATE 04/10 AM 4.5 1.8 2.4 1 MINOR 04/10 PM 4.7 2.0 1.8 1 MINOR 05/11 AM 3.6 0.9 1.4 1 NONE 05/11 PM 4.1 1.4 1.2 1 NONE COROLLA NC MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 5.5 FT, MODERATE 6.0 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 03/07 AM 3.9 0.2 1.0 2 NONE 03/08 PM 5.8 2.1 1.6 3-5 MINOR 04/08 AM 5.3 1.6 2.3 7-8 NONE 04/08 PM 5.8 2.1 1.6 6-7 MINOR 05/09 AM 4.2 0.5 1.2 5 NONE 05/09 PM 5.5 1.8 1.2 4 MINOR &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
